title: Did the scouts lose 425,000 members because of a change of gender name?
subtitle: The precise reasons for the Mormon Church's decision to break up relations with American scouts are still a little vague.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: American scouts lost 425 000 members in May 2018, in response to a decision to include more girls in the organization, and to give the Boy Scouts a new gender-neutral name.
